Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government. 17 percent, to$ 8.44 billion, from$ 6.67 billion a year earlier. Net revenue, which excludes commissions paid to advertising partners, was$ 6.37 billion, up from$ 4.95 billion. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Mr. Eric Schmidt said in a statement.
